title: FUBAR Destroyer 2014
description:
FUBAR Destroyer 2014
--------------------

A new, and updated version of this evil application!

This works as usual:
You cannot install this silently or remotely!
Upon installation, you will get 2 warnings, telling you that you are about to destroy your computer.

Installation takes only a few seconds, and Windows will be shut down immediately after installation is completed.

Next time any user logs into Windows, this application will run, and permanently WIPE & DESTROY all data on all harddisks and removable disks!
This version will destroy data on several disks at the same time. Several threads will be started.


The damage is permanent, and cannot be recovered!

You cannot uninstall this application. Safe-Mode cannot save you this time.


/Ubehage
